heroSubtext: your next ally in technology and development.
aboutMeDescription: I enjoy learning new things and strive to overcome new challenges while analyzing how I have improved through them.
skill1: Frontend development, REST API handling, user authentication, database integration, etc.
skill2: Working under pressure, problem-solving, teamwork, self-research.
project1Description: As a university project, I developed a website for the pharmacy 'Pharmacentral'. I used React and Python, implementing artificial intelligence through Gemini. The AI allows customer service through a chat, where users can input their symptoms, and the system will respond with possible diseases and related suggestions.
project2Description: As a university project, I developed a desktop application for the company 'Representaciones Jorzaba', aimed at inventory management. For its development, I used Visual Studio Community.
project3Description: As a university project, I developed a mobile application for the restaurant 'Fresco', focused on product sales and order management for delivery within the university campus. For its development, I used Netbeans.
project4Description: As a university project, I developed a website for the GuimarBot academy, focused on virtual learning, similar to platforms like Platzi or EdTeam. For its development, I used Visual Studio Code.
contactSubtitle1: I constantly strive to improve myself.
contactSubtitle2: I am currently learning at Platzi.
contactDescription: I am also learning TypeScript and other frameworks through my open-source repositories. Besides that, I also constantly practice backend development.
contactMessage: Get in touch with me via email or other social networks.
